jobs.title: Senior Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Join our team to build next-generation web applications using modern frameworks and cutting-edge technologies.
requirements: Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript (ES6+)
Experience with React or Angular
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and GraphQL
Good understanding of responsive design
Excellent problem-solving skills

jobs.title: Machine Learning Engineer
jobs.description: Develop and deploy machine learning models at scale to improve search and recommendation systems.
requirements: PhD or Master's in Computer Science or related field
Strong experience with TensorFlow or PyTorch
Proficiency in Python and data structures
Experience with large-scale data processing
Published research in ML/AI is a plus

jobs.title: Technical Program Manager
jobs.description: Lead cross-functional teams to deliver complex technical projects on time and within scope.
requirements: 5+ years of technical program management experience
Strong understanding of software development lifecycle
Excellent communication and leadership skills
Experience with Agile methodologies
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent

jobs.title: Cloud Solutions Architect
jobs.description: Design and implement scalable cloud solutions on Azure for enterprise clients worldwide.
requirements: 5+ years experience with cloud platforms
Deep knowledge of Azure services and architecture
Experience with microservices and containerization
Strong communication and client-facing skills
Azure certifications preferred

jobs.title: Software Engineer II
jobs.description: Build innovative features for Microsoft 365 products used by millions of users daily.
requirements: Strong coding skills in C#, Java, or C++
Experience with distributed systems
Knowledge of data structures and algorithms
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science
Passion for building reliable software

jobs.title: Software Development Engineer
jobs.description: Build and maintain distributed systems that power Amazon's global e-commerce platform.
requirements: Strong programming skills in Java, C++, or Python
Experience with distributed systems and databases
Knowledge of data structures and algorithms
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
Experience with AWS services is a plus

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description: Apply advanced analytics and machine learning to solve complex business problems.
requirements: Master's or PhD in Statistics, Math, or related field
Strong programming skills in Python or R
Experience with SQL and big data technologies
Knowledge of ML algorithms and statistical modeling
Excellent data visualization skills

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: Build and maintain infrastructure automation tools for AWS services.
requirements: Experience with CI/CD pipelines and automation
Strong knowledge of AWS services
Proficiency in scripting languages (Python, Bash)
Experience with Docker and Kubernetes
Understanding of networking and security

jobs.title: UX Researcher
jobs.description: Conduct user research to inform product design decisions across Amazon's platforms.
requirements: 3+ years of UX research experience
Strong qualitative and quantitative research skills
Experience with usability testing and surveys
Excellent communication and presentation skills
Master's degree in HCI or related field preferred

jobs.title: Mobile Engineer (React Native)
jobs.description: Develop cross-platform mobile applications used by billions of people around the world.
requirements: Expert knowledge of React Native
Experience with iOS and Android development
Strong understanding of mobile UI/UX principles
Experience with performance optimization
Passion for building user-centric products

jobs.title: AR/VR Software Engineer
jobs.description: Build immersive experiences for Meta's Reality Labs products including Quest and Ray-Ban Stories.
requirements: Strong C++ programming skills
Experience with 3D graphics and rendering
Knowledge of Unity or Unreal Engine
Understanding of computer vision algorithms
Experience with VR/AR hardware is a plus

jobs.title: Data Engineer
jobs.description: Build and maintain data pipelines that power personalization and recommendations for our streaming platform.
requirements: Strong experience with Spark, Kafka, or similar tools
Proficiency in Python, Scala, or Java
Experience with data warehousing and ETL processes
Knowledge of SQL and NoSQL databases
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP)

jobs.title: Content Operations Manager
jobs.description: Manage content delivery workflows and ensure seamless streaming experience for global users.
requirements: 3+ years of operations or project management experience
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Experience with workflow automation tools
Excellent communication skills
Media or entertainment industry experience preferred

jobs.title: Backend Engineer - Streaming
jobs.description: Optimize video streaming infrastructure to deliver high-quality content to millions globally.
requirements: Strong experience with Java or Node.js
Knowledge of CDN and video streaming protocols
Experience with microservices architecture
Understanding of distributed systems
Experience with monitoring and observability tools

jobs.title: iOS Software Engineer
jobs.description: Create innovative features for iOS that delight millions of users worldwide.
requirements: Expertise in Swift and Objective-C
Deep understanding of iOS frameworks and UIKit
Experience with SwiftUI is a plus
Strong computer science fundamentals
Passion for creating exceptional user experiences

jobs.title: Hardware Engineer
jobs.description: Design and develop cutting-edge hardware for Apple's next-generation products.
requirements: BS/MS in Electrical Engineering or related field
Experience with circuit design and PCB layout
Knowledge of signal integrity and power design
Proficiency with design tools (Altium, Cadence)
Strong debugging and problem-solving skills

jobs.title: Backend Engineer
jobs.description: Build scalable backend services that deliver music to over 500 million users globally.
requirements: Strong experience with Java, Python, or Go
Knowledge of microservices architecture
Experience with distributed systems and message queues
Familiarity with PostgreSQL and Redis
Understanding of API design best practices

jobs.title: UI/UX Designer
jobs.description: Design intuitive and beautiful user interfaces for Adobe's suite of creative tools.
requirements: Expert in Figma, Adobe XD, and Illustrator
Strong portfolio showcasing web and mobile design
Understanding of design systems and accessibility
Ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams
Experience with user research and testing

jobs.title: Product Marketing Manager
jobs.description: Drive go-to-market strategy and positioning for Adobe Creative Cloud products.
requirements: 5+ years of product marketing experience
Strong understanding of creative software market
Excellent written and verbal communication
Experience with competitive analysis
Data-driven approach to decision making

jobs.title: Quality Assurance Engineer
jobs.description: Ensure quality and reliability of Adobe's flagship creative applications.
requirements: 3+ years of software testing experience
Experience with automated testing frameworks
Knowledge of Selenium, Appium, or similar tools
Strong attention to detail
Familiarity with Adobe products is a plus

jobs.title: Full Stack Engineer
jobs.description: Build end-to-end features for the world's largest marketplace for unique stays and experiences.
requirements: Proficiency in React and Node.js
Experience with Ruby on Rails or similar frameworks
Strong knowledge of RESTful APIs and GraphQL
Experience with relational and NoSQL databases
Understanding of web performance optimization

jobs.title: Trust & Safety Specialist

requirements: 2+ years in trust & safety or customer support
Strong analytical and investigation skills
Excellent judgment and decision-making ability
Experience with case management systems

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: Manage and optimize infrastructure to ensure Slack runs reliably for millions of daily active users.
requirements: Experience with Kubernetes and Docker
Strong knowledge of AWS or GCP
Proficiency in infrastructure-as-code (Terraform, Ansible)
Experience with CI/CD pipelines
Strong scripting skills in Python or Bash

jobs.title: Customer Success Manager
jobs.description: Help enterprise customers maximize value from Slack and drive product adoption.
requirements: 3+ years in customer success or account management
Strong relationship building skills
Experience with SaaS products
Excellent presentation and communication skills
Understanding of enterprise workflows

jobs.title: Security Engineer
jobs.description: Protect Slack's infrastructure and user data through robust security practices.
requirements: Strong knowledge of security best practices
Experience with penetration testing and vulnerability assessment
Understanding of encryption and authentication
Familiarity with compliance standards (SOC2, ISO)
Programming skills in Python or Go

jobs.title: Product Manager
jobs.description: Lead product strategy and development for features that empower entrepreneurs worldwide.
requirements: 3+ years of product management experience
Strong analytical and data-driven decision-making skills
Experience working with engineering and design teams
Understanding of e-commerce and online retail
Excellent communication and stakeholder management

jobs.title: Merchant Support Advisor
jobs.description: Provide exceptional support to Shopify merchants via chat, email, and phone.
requirements: Strong customer service skills
Basic understanding of e-commerce
Excellent written and verbal communication
Problem-solving mindset
Willingness to work flexible shifts

jobs.title: Salesforce Developer
jobs.description: Develop custom solutions on the Salesforce platform to meet enterprise client needs.
requirements: Strong knowledge of Apex, Visualforce, and Lightning Web Components
Experience with Salesforce configuration and customization
Understanding of integration patterns and APIs
Salesforce certifications (Platform Developer I/II)
Experience with Agile development methodologies

jobs.title: Solution Architect
jobs.description: Design end-to-end Salesforce solutions for complex enterprise requirements.
requirements: 8+ years of Salesforce experience
Multiple Salesforce certifications including Architect credentials
Deep understanding of Salesforce ecosystem
Strong client-facing and presentation skills
Experience with multi-cloud implementations
